paper.title: A new signature scheme based on the DSA giving message recovery

author.org: Technical University of Vienna, A-1040 Vienna, Austria
Rlt;supgt;3lt;/supgt; Security Engineering AG, CH-8607 Aathal, Switzerland

paper.abstract: In this paper we present a modification of the DSA which allows signatures with message recovery. The new public key signature scheme is then applied to create (a) an identity-based public key system without restrictions in trust and (b) a one-pass key exchange protocol with mutual authentication.
